rows.label: qst701201_msg0001
rows.name:
Excuse me, has anyone here been
to Torigo Village recently?

rows.label: qst701201_msg0002
rows.name:
My master went there
and hasn't come back.

rows.label: qst701201_msg0004
rows.name:
A few weeks ago. The attacks
from Heaven's Holy Grail have
been increasing lately.

rows.label: qst701201_msg0005
rows.name:
He said he had something he wanted to do
in his hometown before Iira was attacked,
so he left the shop, and since then...

rows.label: qst701201_msg0006
rows.name: May I ask for your master's name?

rows.label: qst701201_msg0008
rows.name:
He's middle-aged, a bit cautious,
and loves walking so much he
makes it a daily routine.

rows.label: qst701201_msg0009
rows.name: But he loves glasswork even more...

rows.label: qst701201_msg0010
rows.name:
...He's a very important
person to you. I promise we'll
find him, so please wait.

rows.label: qst701201_msg0012
rows.name:
Yes. I know well the feeling of
thinking of someone important.

rows.label: qst701201_msg0013
rows.name:
So please, believe in
Thales-san's safety.

rows.label: qst701201_msg0014
rows.name:
Thank you. I'm such a
worrier... I'm sorry.

rows.label: qst701201_msg0015
rows.name:
I heard my master's home is at
the back of Torigo Village.

rows.label: qst701201_msg0016
rows.name:
If you find him, could you
tell him that his apprentice,
Sharla, was worried?

rows.label: qst701201_msg0017
rows.name:
Laura-sama, um... Is that
wise? Torigo Village is...

rows.label: qst701201_msg0018
rows.name:
...I want to check for myself, and
then tell her what I've found.
